title: Thermodynamics Property Chart-Based Flipped Learning Curriculum

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational thermodynamics concepts (e.g., law of energy conservation, equations of state)
context.additional_context: Educational environment focusing on visualizing thermodynamic property relationships using digital devices and VR simulations

learning_goals: Students can quantitatively explain thermodynamic state changes in water using P-v and T-s diagrams.
Learners can simulate phase-change processes in saturated liquid/saturated vapor regions through attribute charts in a simulated environment.
Participants can achieve at least 80% application accuracy in VR-based formative assessments for concepts learned via flipped learning.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
